title: 75/159/EEC: Commission Decision of 25 February 1975 on the reform of agricultural structures in the Federal Republic of Germany in implementation of Title I of Directive No 72/161/EEC (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 25 February 1975  on the reform of agricultural structures in the Federal Republic of Germany in implementation of Title I of Directive No 72/161/EEC  (Only the German text is authentic)  (75/159/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The schemes of the various Länder of the Federal Republic of Germany for the provision of socio-economic guidance for the agricultural Community in the Federal Republic of Germany, as notified by the Government of the said Federal Republic on 17 October 1974, satisfy the conditions for financial contribution from the Community to common measures as referred to in Article 8 of Directive No 72/161/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 February 1975.
For the Commission
P.J. LARDINOIS
Member of the Commission
